Subject: Women in Tech, Al Jalila Foundation Recognition,Echoes of Earth, JACQUEMUS x TIMBERLAND , Ariana Grande x Swarovski, Guess takes over Eva Beach House
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/97c0441f75e48f2d866ef2352c5d16041001434895.jpg> 	
Calling all “Women in Tech” 

We are recruiting women across the Group to join our new “Women in Tech” programme who can help lead our Group’s digital transformation. 

The programme will equip you with advanced skills in Salesforce Technologies, AI, Data, and Customer Experience to drive innovation and create a supportive and inclusive network of mentors and role models in Tech.

The first cohort will be lead by Salesforce and will begin on 01 May with the graduation on 28 May.

Are you ready to lead the digital future?

Read more & Sign up now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=794&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-6-min.png> 	

Al Jalila Foundation Recognizes Chalhoub Group

Read more & Sign up now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=794&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-6-min.png> 	

Al Jalila Foundation Recognizes Chalhoub Group

We're proud to share that Chalhoub Group has received a special recognition from Al Jalila Foundation for our ongoing support across the below impactful initiatives:

• Support to Hamdan Bin Rashid Cancer Hospital


• Employee Engagement through Volunteering

• Retail Campaigns

Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=795&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=795&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

Join Us for A Unique Show! "Echoes of Earth"


 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=796&user=10620> 	

Experience an immersive blend of theater, music, and film that highlights the beauty of nature and the urgency of climate action. Featuring live actors, musicians, and stunning visuals, this show will inspire you to make a lasting impact.
You and your family will have the opportunity to participate in a variety of rotating activities
Saturday, 26th April 2025 - 8:00 pm - 10:00 pm 
Thursday, 29th May 2025 - 8:00 pm - 10:00 pm 

Register Now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=796&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png>

Register Now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=796&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

JACQUEMUS x TIMBERLAND  


Discover ‘La Bateau’, the new Jacquemus + Timberland collab launching exclusively on Jacquemus.ae <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=797&user=10620>  and in our Dubai Mall boutique.

Log-in with your Chalhoub credentials and your employee discount will be applied automatically at check-out.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=798&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

Ariana Grande x Swarovski

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=799&user=10620> 	

For Spring-Summer 2025, global pop icon and Brand Ambassador Ariana Grande enters the Swarovski fantasy world of color and light, transforming in a Metamorphosis that makes every facet of her personality shine with creativity, savoir-faire, and joyful self-expression. 

Imagined by Global Creative Director Giovanna Engelbert, customers are invited to step into a world where the transformative power of crystal flourishes, ​where extravagance and wonder shine from every facet, ​where a celebration of joy awaits them.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-5-min.png> 	
Guess takes over Eva Beach House

Guess takes over Eva Beach House
